titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Arthur Mizener Papers

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

repository.corpname: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

did.unitdate: undated

bioghist.p: This collection is an exchange of letters between Arthur Mizener and John Crowe Ransom, Mizener and Robert Penn Warren, and Mizener and Allen Tate. It covers the years 1938 through 1974. Literature, criticism, research, publishing, and employment possibilities are the major subjects of the letters. Each of the three sets of letters is arranged in chronological order with sender and receiver identified by initial.
